title: (x) Nicorette - (similar to) Cosmos {Philippe (self)}
content:
May have been inspired by AI Oz Brush, tho.   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224348im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/39731.jpg)
author: pattyfab

comments.content: Is Cosmos a cigarette or a font?

How about Helvetic Neue Extended ... one of the bolder fonts?   
   
 [http://www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.asp?pid=242677](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224348/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.asp?pid=242677)   
   
Or maybe try "What the Font?" ...   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224348/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/)   
   
Hope that helps ...
